data.title: Mark Gorton - Creator Of LimeWire Peer to Peer Sharing. Tower Research Capital. Robert Kennedy Jr. Supporter. Mscs Media #339 Full Ep:...
data.meta_description:
199K likes, 0 comments - mscsmedia on September 28, 2023: "Mark Gorton - Creator Of LimeWire Peer to Peer Sharing. Tower Research Capital. Robert Kennedy Jr. Supporter. Mscs Media #339 Full Ep: https://spoti.fi/45er8Qm 
X: markgortonNYC https://www.markgorton.substack.com https://www.tower-research.com
Mark Gorton founder, and creator of LimeWire. A peer-to-peer file-sharing client for the Java Platform. 
Chief executive of the Lime Group. Lime Group, based in New York, owns LimeWire as well as Lime Brokerage LLC (a stock brokerage), ⁠Tower Research Capital⁠ LLC (a hedge fund), and LimeMedical LLC (a medical software company). Mark has given $1 million to the anti-vaccine nonprofit organization called Children’s Health Defense since 2021. In 2009 Utne Reader named Gorton one of "50 visionaries who are changing your world".
https://www.Americanvalues2024.org
https://www.markgorton.substack.com 
 X: markgortonNYC 
https://www.tower-research.com
#podcast #entrepreneur #limewire #peertopeer #sharing #robertkennedyjr #tonylyons #election #freedom #agenda #bigpharma #vaccine @spotify @spotifypodcasts @spotifyforpodcasters @mscsmedia".
